ComicInfo.Summary: While Trauma uses her unique style of telekinesis to kill a former KGB agent, Hardcase speaks to Detective Chuck Brown to brief him on his current activites. He also tries to find out if Detective Brown had any information on the enigmatic Rex Mundi but Detective Brown only thought he was a myth or an urban legend. Hardcase decides to use the internet to hire mercenaries that were in the emply of Rex Mundi. He's able to get in contact with Trouble, a member of the Omega Team. They meet in a dingy bar where Hardcase pays Trouble for information on Rex. Trouble explains his connection with Rex Mundi but refuses the money; he wants Hardcase to kill Rex Mundi for this information. Unbeknown to both of them, Rex Mundi and Trauma are in the same bar observing. Before Trouble can reveal where to find Rex, Rex orders Trauma to kill Trouble with her telekinetic abilities, snapping his neck. She timed it perfect so it appeared that Hardcase killed Trouble. Hardcase suspects that Rex had something to do with it.
ComicInfo.Title: Trouble
